comments.body: why is this check_bool_indexer when in all the others its check_bool_array_indexer?  found this bc mypy is complaining about that the first arg should be an Index
Opened https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/34456 for this (and added link in the comment)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1066,1070 @@        # TODO copy=False is broken for astype_nansafe with int -> float, so cannot
        # passthrough copy keyword: https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/34456
        sp_values = astype_nansafe(self.sp_values, subtype, copy=True)
        if sp_values is self.sp_values and copy:
            sp_values = sp_values.copy()
